Translations.Text: Wo que zhi tamen [bu xinyang zhe] hui shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi yige fanren [zhu] chuanshou ta [mu sheng] de.” Tamen suo zhi di nage ren jiang de shi waiguo hua, er zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi mingbai de alabo yu.
Fan bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe, an la jue bu yindao tamen. Tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.
Wei bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe cai hui niezao huangyan, zhexie ren que shi shuohuang zhe.

Shei zai xinyang an la hou you biaoshi bu xin——chufei ta shi bei po xuancheng bu xin, er qi neixin shi duxin de, dan shei ziyuan bu xinyang, tamen bi zao an la de qian nu, bi shou zhongda de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi yinwei tamen xi'ai jinshi sheng yu houshi [zhu]. An la jue bu yindao bu xinyang de minzhong.
Zhexie ren jiushi bei an la fengbile xin ermu di ren, zhexie ren que shi diaoyiqingxin de ren.
Wuyi, tamen zai houshi que shi sunshi zhe.
Ranhou, fan shou pohai hou qianyi zhe, ranhou [wei an la zhi dao] fendou bing jianren zhe, cihou, ni de zhu dui tamen que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de [zhu].
